alert.note: Alert for Bexar; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 26 at 10:49AM CDT until October 26 at 11:30AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Wilson County in south central Texas... Southeastern Bexar County in south central Texas... * Until 1130 AM CDT. * At 1047 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Elmendorf, or 11 miles west of Floresville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... San Antonio, Kirby, St. Hedwig, Elmendorf, La Vernia, China Grove, Calaveras Lake, Sandy Oaks, Buena Vista, Martinez, Parita, Losoya, Southton, Canada Verde, Sayers, Adkins, Braunig Lake, and Brooks City Base. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
